title: Jackal

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Assassinate a player during the night if your recruits have perished.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with 2 recruits, one being a town member, and another being a REF member.
- If one of your recruits die, the other will commit suicide.
- Recruits will know each other, but not each other's roles.
- Recruits do not know you are the Jackal.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent the fall of your group.

fields.name: Recruit Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would stop the Jackal.

desc:
Post 3994
*" What do you mean BetterTOS already did this? Fuck it, I'm stealing it anyway. "*
